original_text: But there was a man called Ananias among the group of believers. His wife was called Sapphira. Together they sold one of their fields.
korean_text: 아나니아라 하는 사람이 그의 아내 삽비라와 더불어 소유를 팔아

sentences.original_text: But there was a man called Ananias
Together they sold one of their fields
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 함께 그들의 밭 중 하나를 팔았습니다
